alert.note: Alert for Cowlitz (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 12:04AM PST until March 02 at 12:57AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowlitz River at Kelso. * WHEN...Until just after midnight Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Above 21.5 feet, flooding of several low lying and secondary roads begins, including the Cowlitz Gardens neighborhood, along with flooding of pasture and lowland upstream of Kelso. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:40 PM PST Monday the stage was 21.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage shortly, to a crest of 22.4 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday night. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1200 PM PST.
